subject: Helmets
Football
Tests and Testing
Education and Schools
Frauds and Swindling
lead_paragraph: The former president of a company that refurbished sports equipment for hundreds of school districts pleaded guilty to charges that included failing to properly test thousands of youth football helmets.
snippet: The former president of a company that refurbished sports equipment for hundreds of school districts pleaded guilty to charges that included failing to properly test thousands of youth football helmets.
